Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating and requiring the use of a model contract for the sale of used automobiles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating and requiring the use of a model contract for the sale of used automobiles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the posting and distribution of information related to secondhand automobile buyers’ rights.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the posting and distribution of information related to secondhand automobile buyers’ rights.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring secondhand automobile dealers to keep electronic records of purchases and sales.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring secondhand automobile dealers to keep electronic records of purchases and sales.
